chargeHist.descr: PTC Fail/Report to County Jail (10 Days +)

result.execSummary:
The defendant Josiah J. NOVOTNY was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Fail/Report to County Jail (10 Days +), a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.425(1m)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Letter from Public Works Department indicating defendant has not complied with community service order.

Petition, Application and Order for Community Service In Lieu of Payment of Fine/Forfeiture.
Judge Mark Rohrer has ordered Josiah Novotny to complete 70.75 hours of unpaid community service work, to be credited at the rate of $8.00 per hour, on or before 05-04-2015.
Letter to Josiah Novotny with application for community service
Final Notice returned as "No Such Street"

Order Modifying Sentence.
It is ordered that the defendant's Huber Privileges be withdrawn until his release date on these files.
Defendant's Notice of Motion; Defendant's Demand and Motion for Discovery and Inspection.
State's Motion and Demand for Discovery.

Defendant in custody on another matter.
Defendant waives his right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 1 for trial.
ARRAIGNMENT - 
Information filed.  Copy served on defense counsel.
NO CONTEST plea entered to the charge of fail to report to jail.  Convicted.
The defendant is sentenced to the Manitowoc County Jail for twenty-five (25) days, under the Huber Law, to commence immediately upon completion of the condition time presently serving.
$518.00 court costs imposed, to be paid by 12-11-14 or 10 days county jail for failure to pay.
Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing.
Information.
Plea Questionnaire and Waiver of Rights.
Ineligible Voting Notice and Acknowledgement.
Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief.
Minutes.

Defendant in custody.   
Defendant demands a preliminary hearing.  Preliminary hearing is set for 07-23-14 at 1:45 p.m.   
Minutes.
RE:  Fail to report to jail, on 06-15-14.

Defendant in custody.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crime of fail to report to jail.  The matter is continued for initial appearance on 07-14-14 at 2:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $1,000.00 recognizance bond with the condition that he maintain absolute sobriety.   Bail furnished and defendant is remanded into custody serving a sentence.
Probable Cause Statement and Judicial Determination.
Minutes.
